Name: Moon Jewel
LongDescription: Slightly boosts Attack and Special Attack. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Cleffa, Clefairy, and Clefable.  Swap a Clef-Claw and a Clef-Fang for a Moon Jewel at the Croagunk Swap Shop.  See what happens if you collect all three of these items!
